title: Finding out the pattern with Pascal's Triangle.
text: We know that the variabels in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is $$6$$.

title: Finding out the coefficients.
text: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are $$1$$, $$6$$, $$15$$, $$20$$, $$15$$, $$6$$, $$1$$.

title: Expanding the polynomial.
text: Use the formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^n$$ + $$___a^n-1b^1$$ + $$___a^n-2b^2$$ +... + $$___a^1 b^n-1$$ + $$b^n$$ and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.

title: Simplify the equation.
text: Simplifying the equation results in the solution: $$x^6-12x^5+60x^4-160x^3+240x^2-192x^1+64$$.
